verses.name: 1 Kings 17:1
verses.text: And Elijah the Tishbite, who was of the inhabitants of Gilead, said unto Ahab, As the Lord God of Israel liveth, before whom I stand, there shall not be dew nor rain these years, but according to my word.

verses.name: 1 Kings 17:2
verses.text: And the word of the Lord came unto him, saying,

verses.name: 1 Kings 17:3
verses.text: Get thee hence, and turn thee eastward, and hide thyself by the brook Cherith, that is before Jordan.

verses.name: 1 Kings 17:4
verses.text: And it shall be, that thou shalt drink of the brook; and I have commanded the ravens to feed thee there.
